usage.sql_example: UPDATE public.avatars SET llm_config = '{"provider": "anthropic", "api_key": "sk-ant-api03-your-api-key-here", "model": "claude-3-opus-20240229"}' WHERE id = 3;
notes: The 'provider' should be set to 'anthropic' for Claude
The 'api_key' field should contain your Anthropic API key
The 'model' field can be set to the specific Claude model you want to use (e.g., 'claude-3-opus-20240229')
Additional fields like 'max_tokens' and 'temperature' are optional and will use defaults if not provided
